Alternatively, maybe the context is trying to say that everyone has their own role or function, regardless of age, so it's impossible to determine who is lazy without more information.

Given all this, I think the answer might be "Can't answer" because there isn't enough information in the context about either person's laziness. The context doesn't provide any clues about their work ethic or activities beyond their ages.
